file_content.text: The Lady of Pain runs a compound not far from here. Bad part of the desert. You can't miss it.
Take the rest of the day off.
Thanks. Now get lost.
Does this "Lady" sell starships to desperate fugitives?
What's her business?
Maybe, but I wouldn't want to deal with her. She doesn't care about money. She's into... other things.
How'd she get to be called the Lady of Pain?
She has quite a name.
She works for the Exchange. They're into a lot of sick stuff. She can't get enough of it.
Go practice your dance moves someplace else.
Leave.
I'll do that.
I appreciate the info. Sorry you're out of a job.
Thanks. Here's compensation...
Uh, no problem. I was thinking about quitting.
Find yourself a new line of work, flatcake.
Quit your day job.
"Flatcake?" What's that supposed to mean?
Finish your floor show, sweetheart. I was enjoying your work.
[Flirt] Stick around.
Thanks, but I sprained something when I dove for cover. I, uh, should go have it looked at.
Guess we're off to see the Lady of Pain, huh? This should be interesting.
I'm going back to the family moisture farm....
Don't kill me! I'm just a dancer!
I need to find the Lady of Pain. Know where she is?
I performed for her once. She gave me the creeps.
Uh, I'm kinda busy here? This isn't as easy as it looks.
